channel.title: -Jagex Coming After ME?- I Will Not STAND DOWN~!
channel.description:
[center][b]So Jagex had emailed me and submitted a "DMCA" ticket to my hostgator support.
UPDATES:
They have now filed dmca's against me, my vps hoster, my hostgator. All of the above mentioned i have seen the submitted dmca filed.
DMCA LINK THEY FILED UPON ME: [url=http://www.elitedemons.org/dmca.php]www.elitedemons.org/dmca.php[/url]
Their now claiming that if i don't take down THEIR content that they will pursue.
QUICK QUESTION!!!
Why is Jagex, Runescape coming after other websites, and in the mean time here stands Moparscape.org loud and clear providing thousands of downloads, with all their source code available for full editation.
????????[/b][/center]

item.title: -Jagex Coming After ME?- I Will Not STAND DOWN~!
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:70, topic:409796”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=511071.msg4002951#msg4002951 date=1338261011]

links are links as it has been stated before, jagex cannot do anything if you have a link on your site that some how has content that is copyrighted. Only if the content is on your web server can they do something about it.

Also I didn’t mean you domain your self, i was just saying that they can hijack your domain if they can prove it goes against their trademark and copyright a good example is rsbot.

Then Jagex shouldn’t have the right to shut down any VPS servers, because private servers are not programmed by Jagex and therefore are not their property. I don’t see how that can be illegal. Additionally, the Java server people host somehow happens to be compatible with RS’s 317 client. So it should be only the webhost that is illegal (for any client content).
[/quote]

The protocol is copyright, also a lot of servers still used the Cryption and Stream class ripped from a deob…[/quote]

…so?

Read full topic
item.source: -Jagex Coming After ME?- I Will Not STAND DOWN~!

links are links as it has been stated before, jagex cannot do anything if you have a link on your site that some how has content that is copyrighted. Only if the content is on your web server can they do something about it.

Also I didn’t mean you domain your self, i was just saying that they can hijack your domain if they can prove it goes against their trademark and copyright a good example is rsbot.
[/quote]

Then Jagex shouldn’t have the right to shut down any VPS servers, because private servers are not programmed by Jagex and therefore are not their property. I don’t see how that can be illegal. Additionally, the Java server people host somehow happens to be compatible with RS’s 317 client. So it should be only the webhost that is illegal (for any client content).[/quote]

The protocol is copyright, also a lot of servers still used the Cryption and Stream class ripped from a deob…

item.title: -Jagex Coming After ME?- I Will Not STAND DOWN~!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:56, topic:409796”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=511071.msg3713377#msg3713377 date=1313471804]

This site is like all purple after reading that bright red page lol, but anyway, I fixed jagex’s message for them.

[quote]I represent Jagex Limited (Jagex). Jagex has owned and operated RuneScape, the well-known somewhat known online multiplayer adventure game, at the website www.runescape.com since 2001. There are currently over 5 million active (by active we mean they have logged in more the once) registered players of the game worldwide in country’s that speak English or German. Despite Emulation being legal in 48 states and a majority of country’s around the world we still stride to try to take down these servers with under 40 players because we feel they are causing damage to our site, when in the first place we are the ones who made them leave. Our lawyer’s have warned us to back off and not take on any major RuneScape private server’s because they would actual have lawyers to defend themselves in court and considering we have no real legal pull in taking these down we would get our asses handed to us. So for now we are going to do what we do best, pick on the little guy.

Yours faithfully, Fuck you,

Luke Presland Penis

[/quote]
looooooooooooool

OT: Why not explain to them that you are just trying to lean Java, and programming. Tell them you are in like a Java class of some sort, and want to learn alot… Bullshit them.
[/quote]

And giving items for donations won’t give it away. :P[/quote]
um… no… just um… say… they were doing a giveaway and gave him the money… but def not for the server…

Read full topic
item.source: -Jagex Coming After ME?- I Will Not STAND DOWN~!

Our lawyer’s have warned us to back off and not take on any major RuneScape private server’s because they would actual have lawyers to defend themselves in court and considering we have no real legal pull in taking these down we would get our asses handed to us. This site is like all purple after reading that bright red page lol, but anyway, I fixed jagex’s message for them.

I represent Jagex Limited (Jagex). Jagex has owned and operated RuneScape, the [s]well-known[/s] [b]somewhat[/b] known online multiplayer adventure game, at the website www.runescape.com since 2001. There are currently over 5 million active [b](by active we mean they have logged in more the once)[/b] registered players of the game [s]worldwide[/s] [b]in country's that speak English or German[/b]. [b]Despite Emulation being legal in 48 states and a majority of country's around the world we still stride to try to take down these servers with under 40 players because we feel they are causing damage to our site, when in the first place we are the ones who made them leave. Our lawyer's have warned us to back off and not take on any major RuneScape private server's because they would actual have lawyers to defend themselves in court and considering we have no real legal pull in taking these down we would get our asses handed to us. So for now we are going to do what we do best, pick on the little guy.[/b]

Yours faithfully, Fuck you,

Luke Presland Penis
